SELECT DEAL_ID post_id, DEAL_TITLE post_title, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, LIKE_COUNT, DEAL_DATE post_date, DEAL_VIEW post_view FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, DEAL_ID, DEAL_TITLE, USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, LIKE_COUNT, DEAL_DATE, DEAL_VIEW FROM (SELECT S.DEAL_ID, DEAL_TITLE, S.USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, NVL(DL.DL_CONNT, 0) LIKE_COUNT, DEAL_DATE, DEAL_VIEW FROM (SELECT DEAL_ID, DEAL_TITLE, D.USER_ID, USER_NICKNAME, DEAL_DATE, DEAL_VIEW FROM TBL_DEAL D JOIN TBL_USER U ON
D.DEAL_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchOpt.keyword} || '%'
AND USER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' || #{searchOpt.keyword} || '%'
AND D.USER_ID = U.USER_ID
) S LEFT JOIN (SELECT DEAL_ID ,COUNT(DL.USER_ID) DL_CONNT FROM TBL_DEAL_LIKE DL GROUP BY DL.DEAL_ID) DL ON S.DEAL_ID = DL.DEAL_ID
ORDER BY DEAL_DATE DESC)
WHERE ROWNUM <= #{criteria.page} * #{criteria.amount}) WHERE RNUM > (#{criteria.page} - 1) * #{criteria.amount}
